mosinstall.name: Slick RSS
mosinstall.author: David Thomas
mosinstall.description:
Parse and Display RSS Feed News with Teaser Tooltip
  • Up to 5 RSS feeds per instance.
  • Item Title
  • Item Description
  • Tooltip Title
  • Tooltip Description
  • Limit Word Counts for Title and Description
  • Enable / Disable Images
  • Easily Customise Tooltip Colour
  • Set Link Target (new window, same window)
  • Supports UTF-8 and International Character Sets
  • Supports embedded media files in newsfeed (podcasts etc...)
This module now uses the SimplePie RSS Parser.
To run a check that your server supports SimplePie RSS, click here:
config_check.php
Support and feature request enquiries to davidwhthomas@gmail.com
If this module helps you out, please give feedback at http://extensions.joomla.org
Thanks!
David Thomas

param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Module Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: rsscache
param.label: RSS Cache time
param.description: Set the cache time for the RSS feed(s)

param.name: rssurl1
param.label: RSS URL 1
param.description: Enter the URL of a RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssurl2
param.label: RSS URL 2
param.description: (optional) Enter the URL of a second RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssurl3
param.label: RSS URL 3
param.description: (optional) Enter the URL of a third RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssurl4
param.label: RSS URL 4
param.description: (optional) Enter the URL of a fourth RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rssurl5
param.label: RSS URL 5
param.description: (optional) Enter the URL of a fifth RSS/RDF feed

param.name: rsstitle
param.label: Feed Title
param.description: Display news feed title

param.name: rssdesc
param.label: Feed Description
param.description: Show the description text for each news feed

param.name: rssimage
param.label: Feed Image
param.description: Show the image associated with each news feed

param.name: rssitems
param.label: Number of Items
param.description: Enter number of RSS items to display for each RSS feed

param.name: rssitemtitle_words
param.label: Item Title Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item title text. 0 will show all the text

param.name: rssitemdesc
param.label: Item Description Text
param.description: Show description text for each RSS item in the main list.

param.name: rssitemdesc_words
param.label: Item Description Word Count
param.description: Maximum number of words to display for each RSS item description. 0 will show all the text

param.name: rssitemdesc_images
param.label: Item Description Text Images
param.description: Allow images in the item description text in the main list.

param.name: link_target
param.label: RSS Feed Link Target
param.description: Open RSS feed links in this window or a new window?

param.name: rssitem_show_enclosure
param.label: Show Enclosure Tag Links
param.description: The enclosure tag is used to include multimedia links in RSS feeds. e.g a link like (mpeg 8MB). You can show or hide the link here

param.name: override_charset
param.label: Override Default Encoding
param.description: Override default Joomla charset with RSS charset (use if you have trouble with international character sets)

param.name: translate_encoding
param.label: Change Feed Encoding to match Joomla Default
param.description: If the feed encoding is different from your default joomla encoding, allow the translation of news item characters into your current Joomla default charset.
